Description:
Peaceful, sunny & well located
The northerly aspect means sunlight streams in the living room window of this appealing first-floor apartment. Set at the peaceful rear of the block, the home - ideal for investors or owner-occupiers - has a bright interior with feature parquetry flooring. The bathroom (with laundry facilities) is ensuite-style to the bedroom, which has twin built-in wardrobes. Gas hot water, gas cooking and a gas space heater are included. There's an undercover car park, and from here it's only metres to reserves, Ormond shops, cafes, trains and buses as well as recreation. There's also convenient access to both Monash University campuses.
Jack Slater : 0430 283 724
Insights: 12/63 Ulupna Road, ORMOND VIC 3204 was last sold in 2015 and 19 other 1 bedroom unit in ORMOND have recently been sold.

Description:
Lifestyle Luxury with Bespoke Style
Be prepared to be impressed by the quality of this brand new 3 bedroom 2 bathroom single level rear townhouse. Flawless with European Oak floors, high ceilings and inviting layout, this beautiful home features 3 stunning bedrooms (BIRs), fully tiled bathrooms (ensuite), open plan entertaining, designer stone kitchen (Smeg appliances) & fitted laundry. Sliding doors open to a north-west deck and landscaped courtyard. 6-star energy rated, this vogue sensation boasts double glazed windows, solar hot water, zoned ducted heating/cooling, alarm, great storage, utility courtyard and double auto garage. Walk to North Rd shops and transport.
Dion Besser : 0412 556 443

Description:
Secure sophisticated stylish
While there's a focus on security with intercom entry and an automatic gate to the basement car park and storage cage, and there's an accent on a comfortable lifestyle with reverse-cycle
A/C, and lift-access to all levels of this stylish development, it's this 1st floor apartment itself that's the real star of this show. Sleek and chic, the apartment is flooded with afternoon sunlight that comes over the private balcony and into the open living room which includes a trendy kitchen with stainless steel appliances, smoothtop stove, and glass splashbacks. Both double bedrooms have BIRs and are serviced by a bright bathroom and a Euro laundry. Ormond shops, cafes, trains and buses are in strolling distance as are schools, reserves and recreation. Caulfield and Clayton campuses of Monash Uni are conveniently accessed, too.
Jack Slater : 0430 283 724

Description:
The very place to call "home"
This beautifully maintained residence has been tastefully renovated, extended and decorated to become a warm and inviting, family home with expansive living and entertaining spaces and a relaxing ambience. Along with a fully rendered double-brick exterior, the home has abundant natural light inside, augmented by floating hardwood floors and an open design. The trendy kitchen, open to the dining area with open fireplace, has CaesarStone benchtops, soft-close drawers, induction cooktop, stainless steel appliances, and smoky mirrored glass splashbacks. The huge living room has an outlook to a well-tended private garden, and leads out to a terrific covered deck. There are 3 large bedrooms - 2 with BIRs and ceiling fans - plus an open study and a skylit bathroom with spa bath and a separate toilet. Ducted heating and a reverse-cycle A/C are included. Apart from ample off-street parking, there's a tandem garage and workshop/man cave with power, toilet and potbelly stove. Land size is approx 546sqm, and this property is close to the shops, cafes, trains, buses and council amenities of Koornang Road, and near schools, parks, recreation and major access roads.
Benjamin Dax : 0408 560 790

Address: 4/581 North Road (enter from Ormond Rd) ORMOND VIC 3204
Description:
Villa with own street frontage
Rental property - first home - last home - or your entry into Ormond? Here's a villa to suit your needs. Entered via Ormond Road, this street-front, well maintained, low maintenance home is stylishly presented and bright, with new paintwork and carpets. It includes a spacious living room with A/C (there's also ducted heating); a kitchen with gas cooking and ample storage; and 2 generously proportioned bedrooms with built-in wardrobes. A private courtyard at the rear is ideal for relaxing or for a spot of alfresco entertaining. The property comes with a lockup garage. The Ormond village shopping centre with train station, cafes and buses is only metres away, and reserves, recreation and other amenities are nearby, too.
Benjamin Dax : 0408 560 790

Description:
Sleek sophistication & a serene location
Sophisticated urban design couldn't get more exciting than this spectacular residence, part of a prestigious contemporary development. Here are 3 dynamic levels of living space with luxurious finishes, fittings and inclusions. Here is a brilliant lifestyle choice. The void above the ground floor entry enhances the feeling of light, space and openness. A wow living room, with glossy hardwood flooring, incorporates a curving kitchen which is all granite benchtops and Smeg appliances. Sliding doors open to a private terrace - great for entertaining - wrapped around 2 sides of the residence. The 1st floor comprises 2 large bedrooms with BIRs and their own ensuites, as well as a study nook with BI desk. The master suite (BIRs and ensuite) occupies the 2nd floor and provides views to the City. Among the inclusions - intercom entry, alarm, A/C, ground-floor powder room, and own basement double car park (direct entry to house; automatic door; rainwater tank; under-stairs storage; laundry). This remarkable property is on the fringe of Ormond village near trains, buses, cafes and shops and numerous other amenities.
Jack Slater : 0430 283 724

Description:
Charming Clinker Classic!
Character-rich, this classic clinker has been lovingly maintained and offers a family floor-plan & a lifestyle-friendly location. A large formal lounge with gas heating and a separate air-conditioned dining with built in buffet accompany three robed bedrooms (spacious sun-drenched master), a well-kept vintage bathroom with separate shower & sunken bath and an updated timber kitchen large enough to accommodate hearty family gatherings. Wrapped by established gardens, sun-awnings & a lock up garage, this triple fronted delight on 510m2/5,500sqft (approx.) is conveniently close to McKinnon Primary School, the playgrounds of Packer Park, bus & train links plus Truganini Rd tram, or the bustle & energy of Koornang Rd cafes & shops. This is pure potential...to rent, renew or restore.

Description:
All-New Prestige - All So Private & Secure
PRICE REDUCTION!
Make a safe start, secure a blue-chip investment, step up and find security, privacy and all new prestige in this peaceful rear apartment. Secured beyond intercom entry and its own private stairway, this two bedroom, first-floor apartment has the added security of auto-entry basement garaging with lockable storage and the ultimate luxury of a high-end finish.
Featuring an elite Bosch appliance kitchen with soft-closing cabinetry and glass splashback and a fully polished-porcelain tiled bathroom with European laundry this high-quality home stars luxe finishes including thick CaesarStone benchtops, glossy bamboo floors and privacy-enhancing blinds. Cleverly configured with living opening through a wall of full-height sliding stackers to a dining-sized balcony, each bedrooms is walled by fully-fitted full-height mirrored robes.
This superior apartment even has an optioned up address - just a few minutes walk from Ormond station and North Road Shopping strip. Around the corner from cosmopolitan Glenhuntly Rd shopping and within easy reach of two Monash University campuses by direct public transport and Chadstone Shopping Centre.

Description:
Sophisticated one-bedroom apartment
The look is stylish and contemporary; the ambience is energetically fresh, light, bright and airy; yet the lifestyle is low maintenance, relaxing and comfortable. Indeed, this dynamic 1st floor apartment delivers on every level. The carpeted living room (with panel heating) leads out to a north-facing balcony and is open to the meals area and the chic kitchen which has granite benchtops. The bedroom has a built-in wardrobe; the sparkling bathroom has laundry facilities; and there's a separate toilet. There's security entry to the apartment as well as a carport. Stroll to Ormond shops, cafes, trains and buses, and have easy access to reserves, recreation, schools and Monash Uni (Caulfield).
Jack Slater : 0430 283 724

Description:
Modern Period Stunner Will Take Your Breath Away
Truly the best of both worlds combining gorgeous period detail with vibrant modern pizzazz, this simply stunning 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom home enjoys brilliant attention to detail and immaculate contemporary touches perfect for families.
Flooded with natural light and retaining its classic sensibility with attractive leadlight windows and high ornate ceilings, this fully-renovated dual level home enjoys a bright formal lounge with stone fireplace, spacious living and meals, Caesarstone kitchen with designer pendant lights, soft-close drawers, walk-in pantry, and Miele appliances, master bedroom with ensuite and walk-in robe, 2 additional large bedroom with fitted BIRs, 2 stylish bathrooms, and a private upstairs retreat.
Outdoor entertaining features include a deck and low-maintenance garden, while a front landscaped garden with underground sprinkler system, timber floors, new carpet, laundry, under stairs storage, ducted gas heating, ducted refrigerated cooling, gas hot water service, secure wired alarm, video intercom (both levels), wired for internet and cable TV, and a single remote garage are other inclusions.
In a fantastic location just moments to E.E. Gunn Reserve, Caulfield South Primary School, Kilvington Grammar School, North Road restaurants and cafes, buses, and Ormond Station.

Description:
Rare & Beautiful In-Zone Victorian
Middle Park meets McKinnon College in this in-Zone inner-suburban-style beauty on the hill! High at a blue-chip Ormond Hill/McKinnon College Zone address, this enchanting c.1890 brick Victorian opens up beyond an iron-laced façade with an impeccable renovation designed to catch north sun and offer modern two-storey, three bedroom, two bathroom accommodation.
Reaching back past traditional formal living to a sun-filled northerly family zone, this timeless beauty steps up to a private master level comprising lofty light-filled bedroom, a double-sided WIR and elegant ensuite. Prestige appointed with elite Neff appliances for the kitchen, stone benchtops and solid Australian hardwood floors, this centrally heated home has reverse-cycle air-conditioning upstairs and down and rich period detail throughout - including a ruby-glass entry, deep-corniced ceilings and an impressive fireplace
Even the location has a touch of inner-suburban amenity with the Ormond shopping strip and station within an easy walk, Ormond Primary School within a couple of blocks and the CBD within an easy direct commute.

Description:
Suburban Joy, Quality, Indoor-Out Living
Live a low-maintenance life inside-out or invest in a McKinnon College Zone retail & rail location! Centred in a recently completed group just off the Ormond strip, this cutting-edge two bedroom, 1.5 bathroom townhouse offers the ultimate carefree commuter lifestyle with lofty light-filled indoor-outdoor living, plus a second living area on the first-floor bedroom level.
Prestige appointed with a state-of-the-art CaesarStone kitchen starring waterfall-edge benchtops and high-end Electrolux appliances, and a clever fully-tiled stone-finished two-way ensuite-bathroom, this outstanding home is luxe finished with wideboard European Oak floors, a vast master WIR and mirrored robes. High-tech appointed with individual climate control for every room, there's LED lighting, a water-saving 2000L tank and an oversized auto-garage.
Start in all-new style, invest in a McKinnon College Zone lifestyle location, live the carefree life... whatever your plans, take the chance to benefit from this in-Zone, strip-edge, easy-commute location!

Description:
A Stunning Transformation In The Zone
Located in one of Mckinnon Secondary College zone's most sought-after streets, this single level home on approx 485sqm approx. has been masterfully transformed into a stylish, light filled sanctuary, whilst retaining some of its period allure including timber floors, gorgeous lead light windows and ornate high ceilings. Opening from the beautifully landscaped front garden, the home's reinvention is immediately evident through a living/dining area of generous proportions featuring built-in entertaining unit and stacker doors opening to an expansive covered entertainer's deck. An open plan chef's kitchen with Miele appliances and Caesar stone benches creates a sensational central focal point for the home boasting designer detailing and excellent storage. 3 robed bedrooms (main with chic ensuite/WIR) and vogue bathroom are complemented by GDH, split system AC, water temperature regulator, attic, shed and double carport. Primed for convenience just moments to leading schools, local shops, transport and parklands.

Description:
Stylish & Contemporary Home Ticks all The Right Boxes
Superior quality and brilliant contemporary flair from head to toe make this 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom double storey retreat a coveted prize just a stone's throw to E.E. Gunn Reserve.
Enjoying a low-maintenance sensibility and boasting timber floors, Caesarstone benchtops, and great natural light, this pristine abode showcases dedicated living and meals areas, formal lounge, impressive kitchen with long breakfast bar, soft-closing drawers, and Miele appliances, upstairs master bedroom with double vanity ensuite and a walk-in robe, 2 other bedrooms with fitted BIRs, downstairs bathroom with huge shower, 2nd upstairs bathroom, and a laundry.
A deck and easy care garden out back will be an ideal venue for outdoor BBQs and meals in the summer months, while other features of this home include landscaped front garden, ducted gas heating, refrigerated cooling, large under stairs storage, gas hot water service, secure wired alarm, video intercom (upstairs and downstairs), wired for internet and cable TV, and a single remote garage.
Within close proximity to Caulfield South Primary School, Kilvington Grammar School, Marara Road Reserve, local shops, Booran Road buses, and Ormond Station.

Description:
Renovation Transformation With Family Focus
The generous proportions of this beautifully updated and extended Californian Bungalow are superbly configured for a lifestyle of living and entertaining excellence. Holding exceptional eye-catching appeal every step of the way, the family-sized home showcases a seamless transition from beautifully preserved period character at the front to the striking contrast of a soaring open-plan contemporary design at the rear. A formal lounge and separate dining provide elegant venues for hosting friends while the informal family/meals area lends itself to social casual get-togethers. The kitchen at the heart of the home is a chef's dream with its commercial-style oven and cooktop, butler's pantry, stone benchtops, continuous hot water and extensive storage. A huge north-facing covered deck with pull-down see-through blinds functions as an idyllic indoor-outdoor room regardless of what Melbourne's ever-changing weather brings. Versatility is key to the large separate studio, which could be used as a home office, teenagers' retreat, gymnasium - the sky's the limit. All this is capped off by a downstairs master ensuite bedroom, which is set apart from the upstairs' three-bedroom, one-bathroom kids' zone to give everyone peace and privacy. Advantaged with access via a service road, this illustrious home also features ducted heating throughout, cooling to the bedrooms, a split-system air conditioner, skylights and remote-controlled motorised blinds in the casual zone, twelve solar roof cells, video-monitored entry and multiple off-street parking behind remote driveway gates. Close to Packer Park, Ormond Station, schools, locals shops and Koornang and Centre Roads' retail and dining-out venues.

Description:
Stylish, Solid & Single-Level!
This single-level three bedroom unit is well located walking distance to North Road shops & station... but you may never want to leave home! Recently renovated & updated with stylish flair & superior finish in clean fresh whites with warm chocolate accents, this solid street-front unit showcases a bright new kitchen with stainless steel appliances (including dishwasher), modern sleek bathroom with separate bath & quality fittings, large laundry, separate toilet & single garage! New plush carpet, ducted heating & chic roller blinds complete this smart & tasteful new home or outstanding investment!
Three bedrooms (2 with BIRs), modern bathroom, new kitchen & carpets. Use of extensive outdoor areas. Close to shops & station.

Description:
Period Charm With A Modern Influence
A beautifully compatible balance of decorative period details and impressive modern spaces complements the appeal of this significantly renovated and extended home matched by the perfect tree-lined setting. Classical lines, Baltic Pine/Tasmanian Oak timber floors and corniced high ceilings reflect the c1927 character of a welcoming family room and vast open plan living/meals area, while natural light and access to the northerly rear garden's sunny, covered deck and exceptionally maintained leafy backdrop enhance modern, family-friendly proportions. A central stone kitchen with WIP and breakfast bar makes it own contribution to generous spaces, accompanied by 4 robed bedrooms (main with stylishly updated ensuite/WIR) and luxe bathroom. Ducted heating, split system AC, ample storage, DLUG/workshop and off street parking, are certain to offer enduring family enjoyment, within a few minute's walk to Ormond station, North Rd shops and parks.
Insights: 8 Walsh Street, Ormond VIC 3204 was last sold in 2015 and 21 other 4 bedroom house in Ormond have recently been sold.

Description:
Secure, sunlit and spacious
Here's creative urban design, sleek finishes and fittings, and chic presentation all delivered in a secure, private, conveniently located, contemporary, ground-floor apartment. You'll love the relaxing lifestyle, the space to entertain indoors or outside, the light bright interior and the neutral decor. The entrance hall leads past the 2 double-size bedrooms (with mirror-fronted built-in wardrobes and their own private balconies) to a sunlight-flooded open living room with stone and stainless steel kitchen. Open the sliding doors to make this room one with the private rear courtyard. It's a great entertaining space! Desirable extras include intercom entry; lift access from the secure basement car park (with storage cage); split-system A/C; and Euro laundry. This property is a brief walk to Ormond shops, cafes, trains and buses, and is convenient to reserves, recreation, schools and Monash Uni (Caulfield).
Jack Slater : 0430 283 724
Insights: 7/30 Lillimur Road, ORMOND VIC 3204 was last sold in 2019 and 49 other 2 bedroom unit in ORMOND have recently been sold.

Description:
Vendor Circumstances Require a Sale!
Light and bright, this renovated 2 bedroom ground floor security apartment maximizes living with minimum fuss.
Enjoying timber floors throughout, this sleek sensation features a casual living area, 2 double bedrooms (BIRs), a north facing stylish kitchen with induction cooktop and stainless steel oven and washing machine facilities and a stunning fully tiled bathroom. In a boutique group, this inviting retreat is the perfect starter or investment, complete with a security intercom, slim line blinds and auto gates to a carport.
Brilliantly located to shops, cafes, restaurants and transport along North Road, including Ormond station and Monash University bus.
